abstract: The flying monks of Shaolin may soon learn how to float, as well. The holding company set to run the tourism-related assets of the Shaolin Temple may go public next year.
snippet: The flying monks of Shaolin may soon learn how to float, as well. The holding company set to run the tourism-related assets of the Shaolin Temple may go public next year.
lead_paragraph: The flying monks of Shaolin may soon learn how to float, as well.

headline.main: At Monastery, Plans to Go Public
